# Iowa Liquor Sales Data

### Demonstration of Reading the Data from the API

### Data Cleaning

```{r rename cols}

X <- 
liq2 %>%
  rename_all(
    funs(
      # Remove spaces between words
      str_replace_all(., "[\\(\\)_\\/ ]", "") %>%
      tolower(.)))
```

```{r filter weird numeric values}
library(tidylog)

Y <- X %>%
  filter(saledollars > 0,
         volumesoldliters > 0,
         volumesoldgallons > 0)

```
